name: PicturEngine, Inc.
tag_list: stock-photography, stock-photo, search-engine, stock-photogrpahers, rights-managed, royalty-free, paas, stock-photo-sales-platform, search-stock-photos
overview:
Stock Photo Industry Wide Search, Sales, and delivery platform.

Our purpose, our mission, our passion Foster an environment which values photography. Empower photographers to succeed. Encourage photographers’ passion to create.

PicturEngine brings image buyers and sellers together with just a click. Serving as a resource and guide to the entire stock industry, we make every stock photo, Illustration, vector and footage searchable through one easy-to-use platform.

Just like other search engines, PicturEngine is FREE to use. The ability to quickly and easily search the whole stock photo industry at once saves time and ensures the best results.

Larger stock photo agencies are included within the organic results. Photographers and smaller photo agencies, pay a small ‘advertising’ subscription fee to be included within the search results. It’s important to note that search results are UNBIASED, meaning advertisers cannot pay to gain higher ranking within the search.

As stock photo agencies have grown to mammoth proportions, finding the “right” image is more difficult and time-consuming than ever. Searching through countless images within multiple agency archives has become commonplace, and image buyers say they need to find images faster. Because only a few agencies practice “image exclusivity,” the same content appears over and over again, further complicating the search for stock photos. PicturEngine search results quickly provide image buyers with industrywide results without duplication. We show buyers the base agency, removing unnecessary intermediaries, and encourage exploration of content by providing a closer look at “similars,” enabling the buyer to make an informed purchasing decision.

PicturEngine makes finding the right image fast and easy.
